title: How to Make Meetings Less Terrible (Ep. 389 Rebroadcast)
description: In the U.S. alone, we hold 55 million meetings a day. Most of them are woefully unproductive, and tyrannize our offices. The revolution begins now — with better agendas, smaller invite lists, and an embrace of healthy conflict.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
